transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji ke in varu tech mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mam very good evening main Asim Khan bol raha hun IndiaMART se business manager aapki company register hai IndiaMART ke sath mein mam.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To aapka jo account dekhte hain main unka business manager baat kar raha hun actually aapki baat bhi hui hogi aapki services ko lekar and yahan main dekh raha tha kuch buyleads se related aapne complaint raise kiya hua tha mam.
Customer: Haan sir ye hai.
Executive: To isi ke regarding main aapse baat karna chah raha tha jo service aapko provide ho rahi hai jo buyleads vgera aapko aa rahi hai.
Executive: To aap mujhe jaise aapne yahan par jo mention kiya hua hai jo abhi tak mujhe thoda bahut ek chota little bit idea jo diya hua hai aapke account manager ne jo aapka product hai uska kuch quantity ka jo usme hai specification usse related kuch aap bata rahi thi.
Customer: Karo na main ek bar aapko concern person se baat karati hun na ek second.
Executive: Okay koi baat nahi.

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir good evening main Asim Khan bol raha hun IndiaMART se business manager.
Customer: Ji ji bataiye.
Executive: Aapki company register hai na IndiaMART ke sath mein to usi ke regarding main baat karna chah raha tha mam ne mujhe bataya tha jaise ki aapne complaint raise kiya hua tha services ko lekar.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aap mujhe batayenge sir jaise ki jo mention unhone mere ko bataya kuch quantity se related aapko issue aa raha tha vahan par sir.
Customer: Sir hamare ko issue aa raha hai continue jabse humne package active karvaya hai ki hamare paas relevant leads nahi aa rahi fir wo mail mein bhi likha hua hai ab wo.
Executive: Haan bilkul.
Customer: Nahi jaise jo leads aapne consume ki hui hai main dekh bhi raha hun ye jo aap jin products mein aap deal karte ho usse related hi to aap agar consume kar rahe hain to wo buyleads agar post hoti hai wo aapko aati hai to ye jaise jo buyleads aapne consume ki hai inme kya issue aa raha hai aap mujhe bataiye sir thoda sa.
Customer: Sir usse issue ye nahi hai RO jiski lead aa rahi hai hai na reverse osmosis plant ki jo leads aa rahi hai wo hamara sabse chota product hai aur usme hum interest bhi nahi rakhte wo to ye hai ki hamare stand ka ek product hai to hum usme karte hain hamare main product hai sewage treatment plant aur effluent treatment plant.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Uski single lead hamare paas nahi aayi.
Customer: Sewage treatment plant.
Customer: Aur effluent treatment plant.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ye hamare do main product hai bade product.
Executive: Ye aapka portable sewage treatment plant jo aapka hai ya domestic sewage treatment plant industrial sewage treatment plant yahi hai na sir aapka.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Actually isme sir jaise main dekh raha hun to buyleads to sir jaise jitni generate ho rahi hai wo vahan par kyunki thode high sold category hai isliye buyleads kam available hai inki sir.
Customer: Lekin aisa thodi hota hai ki sir do dhai mahine mein single bhi na aaye.
Executive: Sir buyleads aa rahi hai lekin ho sakta hai jis time aa rahi hai us time aap available nahi hai online wo sold out ho ja rahi hai sir.
Executive: Agar main jaise isko jitni bhi buyleads post hoti hai hamari trade.indiamart.com par post hoti hai.
Executive: Trade.indiamart.com par agar main search kar raha hun to jaise aapne jo mujhe sewage treatment plant bataya main aapko batata hun iski kitni buyleads jaise generate ho rahi hai ho sakta hai jis time aap check kar rahe ho us time yani kyunki koi bhi buyleads sir agar 10 second 20 second mein bhi consume ho jati hai agar available nahi ho pata hai.
Customer: Sir humne staff sirf IndiaMART ki lead purchase karne ke liye rakha hua hai aur wo kuch nahi chala sakta.
Executive: Last month sir jaise main dekh raha hun sewage treatment plant ki jo buyleads post hui hai IndiaMART par around 46 buyleads post hui hai sir.
Customer: Ah.
Executive: Sewage treatment plant jo aapne mere ko bataya.
Customer: Ab sir wo to ye hai na ki aapka distribution kya kehta hai kisko kis package pe kitni leads ja rahi hai ab wo to aap.
Executive: Nahi package wise kuch nahi hota hai sir nahi nahi package wise kuch nahi hota sir koi bhi buyer ho sir wo vahan par yani ki jitni bhi buyleads hoti hai wo sari supply ko ek sath dikhti hai iska koi package se lena dena nahi hota hai bas ye condition hai ki ek buylead ko maximum paanch log consume kar sakte hain paanch log se jyada consume nahi karte.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Baki ye nahi hai ki agar aapne trust ki le rakha hai ya maine uske upar ka service le rakha hai ya teesre ne koi aur service usse upar le rakha hai to pehle usko dikhega nahi aisa kuch nahi hai wo buyleads sari supply ko ek sath dikhega jo bhi paanch pehle supply consume kar lenge wo vahan par yani ki sold out ho jayega sir to isliye thoda sa bas vahi hai ki jitni buyleads ab buyleads kam available hone ki vajah se thoda sa hyper active in the sense main ye bhi karta hun ek bar aapke account manager ko bhi bol dunga ki bhai jitni bhi rozana aap subah aake ek bar check karke agar isse related koi buylead post ho rahi hai turant sir ko whatsapp pe bhej do to aapke whatsapp pe bhijwa dunga sir main itna karwa sakta hun.
Customer: Sir ek baat batata hun aap hamari consume ki buyleads dekhiye usme sari ki sari RO ki uske alava single product dusra nahi hai.
Customer: Thoda sa irritating hota hai na ki yaar payment di hui hai jis kaam ke liye wo hota nahi hai aur ek staff alag se bithaya hua hai uske liye hai na wo bhi hai aur uske baad bhi kuch revert nahi aata to fir wo.
Customer: Feel less ho gaya na.
Executive: Nahi I totally understand sir jo aap mujhe bol rahe hain aapne bilkul investment kiya hua hai sir aur lagta hai ki bhai agar maine investment kahin ki kiya to mere ko mile but vahi hota hai sir thoda thoda kabhi maine vahi bataya iske regarding.
Customer: Wo to abki bari hua hai pehle jitne bhi package chale the mere private limited ke sath chale ho ya abhi jo run ho raha hai is firm ke sath chale hain proper rehta tha ki abki bari hua hai nahi hame koi samasya nahi aati.
Executive: Sir to aap khud soch sakte hain sir jab samasya pehle bhi nahi aati to aisa to hai nahi ki sir hum vahan koi intentionally ye service aapko yani samasya de rahe hain bas vahi hai ki sir thoda high sold ko technical error ho jo nahi resolve ho pa raha ho nahi kyunki humne bahut call kar chuke hain unhone kitni bar hamare hisab se system lekar ke cheeze thik ki hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Lekin fir bhi nahi ho paya to actual hum karenge to sahi na kuch na kuch to hath pair to marenge.
Executive: Bilkul nahi bilkul sir main bilkul sir hamara sir aisa nahi hai ki sir ki bilkul hi jo hai ki wo nahi aayega but vahi hai sir maine vahi aapko bata diya ki isme ek bar main ye bhi dekh leta hun jo buylead generate ho ek bar ye koshish karke dekh lete hain apne side se ki bhai rozana subah aakar ek bar dekh lete hain ki kuch buyleads post ho rahi hai ya nahi ho rahi hai kyunki abhi jaise main check kar raha hun sewage treatment plant se related to mere paas do buylead dikh rahi hai but wo India ki nahi hai out of India ki hai sir.
Customer: Nahi wo bhi hum karte hain na sir bas ha ye hai ki wale pe humne IC code update nahi kiya hua.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap IC code update kar bhi denge to wo export ka to separate hai uske liye to aapko amount pay karna padega separate isliye main bata raha hun.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: Haan yani jo service aap chala rahe hain wo domestic hai domestic wo domestic ka rehta hai main ek bar sir yahi kar sakta hun ki ek bar isme yani ki rozana khud apne side se personally subah aane ke baad ye check kar sakte hain ki kitni buyleads sir aayi hai ya nahi aayi hai baki to sir jitni bhi buyleads post ho rahi hai uske according vahan par aapko.
Customer: Achcha ek bar aap aisa kar dijiye personal level pe aap review kar lijiye koi problem to nahi.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul ha vahi maine bola main aapke satisfaction ke liye sir main satisfaction ke liye sir agar aapko lag raha hai main ek bar technical jo team hai puri unko mail bhi drop kar deta hun ki ye ye trick keywords hai sewage treatment plant aapne bata bataya industrial sewage treatment plant bataya water treatment sewage treatment plant aapne mujhe bataya ye ye category hai jinme client deal karte hain aur buyleads yani ki unko nahi aa rahi to main aapke ek personal satisfaction ke liye wo mail bhi drop karke aapko bata deta hun to uski koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan actual kya hai provider aap bhi hai hum bhi hai customer satisfaction hamara market hai.
Executive: Bilkul you are right.
Executive: Nahi wo bilkul sir main sir main motive sir vahi hai agar customer satisfy nahi hoga abhi sir maine aapko chalo man lo ek saal ka paisa liya ya kuch bhi hai kal ko aapka renewal aega aap nahi karwaoge to wo to loss company ke liye bhi hai sir aur koi nahi chahega sir uska koi client base uska platform chhod kar jaye sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main ek bar sir aapke jo hai level pe check karaiye.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul samajh liya karta hun sir.
Customer: Haan thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads. 

- Only receiving RO (Reverse Osmosis) leads.

- Staff dedicated to IndiaMART leads not productive.



Resolution:

- Executive will check daily for relevant leads.

- Executive will email the technical team.

- Executive offered to send leads via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check for relevant leads daily.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sewage treatment plant, effluent treatment plant, ic code, trade.indiamart.com
